name: discord-rich-presence
author: Navidrome
description: Discord Rich Presence integration for Navidrome

config.reason: To read Discord application ID and Rich Presence configuration settings

artwork.reason: To generate public URLs for album/artist artwork to display in Discord

scheduler.reason: To schedule periodic presence updates and handle connection timeouts

websocket.reason: To connect to Discord Gateway for real-time Rich Presence updates

http.reason: To communicate with Discord API for authentication and presence management

cache.reason: To cache Discord session tokens and avoid redundant API calls
